fr.liglab.adele.icasa.self.star.follow.me.exercice.four.manager

Interface FollowMeAdministration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FollowMeManagerImpl

    public interface FollowMeAdministration
    The Interface FollowMeAdministration allows the administrator to configure its preference regarding the management of the Follow Me application.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setIlluminancePreference

        void setIlluminancePreference(IlluminanceGoal illuminanceGoal)
        Sets the illuminance preference. The manager will try to adjust the illuminance in accordance with this goal.
        Parameters:
        illuminanceGoal - the new illuminance preference

      • getIlluminancePreference

        IlluminanceGoal getIlluminancePreference()
        Get the current illuminance preference.
        Returns:
        the new illuminance preference

        Configure the energy saving goal.
        Parameters:
        energyGoal - : the targeted energy goal.

        the current energy goal.
